message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a great deal for you, considering the value you'll get out of the product. Let's make this happen!
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,250 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get out of it.
